title: Add interactive expandable service cards with detailed information

requirements.text: Convert the existing ServicesSection component to use an accordion/expandable card pattern where each service card can be clicked to expand and reveal detailed information below the service title and description

quotes: Jab user kisi service ke box par click kare, toh woh niche ki taraf expand (khul) jaye aur details dikhaye

acceptanceCriteria: Each service card is clickable and toggles between collapsed and expanded states
Expanded state shows additional details without navigating away from the page
Only one card can be expanded at a time (accordion behavior)

requirements.text: Add detailed content for 'Dental Check-up & Cleaning' service expansion including: Procedure description 'Digital X-ray aur danton ki gehrai se safai (Scaling)', Benefit 'Cavity aur masoodon ki bimari se bachav', Time duration 'Sirf 30-45 minute', and a CTA button 'Abhi check-up schedule karein' that navigates to the booking page

quotes: Procedure: Digital X-ray aur danton ki gehrai se safai (Scaling)

acceptanceCriteria: Expanded card displays procedure, benefit, and time information in Hindi/Urdu
CTA button is prominently displayed and functional
Content is properly formatted and readable

requirements.text: Add detailed content for 'Root Canal Treatment (RCT)' service expansion including: Procedure 'Sade hue hisse ko saaf karke danton ko bachana', Special feature 'Single-sitting painless procedure (bin dard ke)', Benefit 'Asli daant ko nikaalne se bachata hai', and CTA button 'Dard se chutkara paayein' that navigates to the booking page

quotes: Khasiyat: Single-sitting painless procedure (bin dard ke)

acceptanceCriteria: Expanded card highlights the painless single-sitting procedure
All content displays correctly in Hindi/Urdu
CTA button navigates to booking page

requirements.text: Add detailed content for 'Dental Implants' service expansion including: Procedure 'Titanium post ke saath naye majboot daant lagana', Longevity 'Ye zindagi bhar saath dete hain', Benefit 'Khane-peene aur bolne mein asli danton jaisa mehsoos hota hai', and CTA button 'Apni muskurahat wapas paayein' that navigates to the booking page

quotes: Life: Ye zindagi bhar saath dete hain

acceptanceCriteria: Expanded card emphasizes lifetime durability of implants
Natural feel benefits are clearly communicated

requirements.text: Add detailed content for 'Teeth Whitening' service expansion including: Procedure 'Advanced laser technology se peelepan ko hatana', Result 'Pehle hi session mein 3-4 shades safed daant', Benefit 'Shaadi ya party ke liye turant chamak', and an appropriate CTA button that navigates to the booking page

quotes: Result: Pehle hi session mein 3-4 shades safed daant
Fayda: Shaadi ya party ke liye turant chamak

acceptanceCriteria: Expanded card highlights immediate results (3-4 shades whiter)
CTA button navigates to booking page

requirements.text: Ensure the remaining services (Braces & Aligners and Pediatric Dentistry) also have expandable sections with similar structured content including procedure, benefits, and CTAs that navigate to the booking page, maintaining consistency with the other four services
acceptanceCriteria: All six services have expandable content
Content structure is consistent across all services
All CTA buttons navigate to booking page

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file for this feature
Do not change the existing booking system functionality
Maintain the current Hindi/Urdu language support throughout expanded content
Preserve the existing visual design theme (healthcare teal colors, professional typography)
nonGoals: Adding new services beyond the existing six
Changing the overall page layout or navigation structure
Adding backend storage for service details
